DOC.brief_summary: Investigators will characterize the body composition and metabolism of infants born from lean, overweight or obese mothers from whom they had previously obtained a placenta and/or cord blood as part of the earlier placenta and cord blood study (#111576)
DOC.brief_title: Body Composition of Infants: Follow-up to Placenta and Cord Blood Analyses
DOC.criteria: mother's prior participation in study #111576 with successful collection of placenta infant age 12 months (+/ 9 months) mother did not participate in study #111576 mother did participate in study #111576, but collection of placenta was not successful infant not age 12 months (+/ 9 months)
